definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="range" type="Number">range</variable><variable id="range2" type="Number">range2</variable><variable id="range3" type="Number">range3</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="102" y="151"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block name="DO0"><block inline="false" type="entity_set_movement"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="vx"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field
